page.title: 01Treviscoe/Trethosa Area
page.content: A number of spots offer fine views particularly to the South and West.The region falls into two quite distinct features.The major part is dominated by the China Clay Industry.This covers the higher ground. To the South and a little lower is natural grassland which is typical Cornish farmland. The area is sparsely populated.There is a good deal of unemployment and the majority of jobs are within the Clay Industry.English China Clays traditionally give precedence to employing the children of employees. {DANGER DANGER DANGER DANGER DANGER This area is dangerous if not treated with caution.The dangers are:-{water {filled pits with steep crumbling {sides;concealed mineshafts;heavy {industrial vehicles;blasting {operations;steep drops at roadsides.
